short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that enables importing stories from JIRA to SprintSignal, planning poker application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SprintSignal is a planning poker application that enables developers to easily evaluate and estimate complexity of sprint stories. SprintSignal browser extensions makes importing stories from platforms like JIRA a breeze.

The process is very simple: just open any page on JIRA or other supported platform that contains stories, click on the SprintSignal extension icon in your toolbar, and click Import button to create a new SprintSignal session.
